org.jgrapes.portal.events

Class PortletResourceRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event<ResourceResult>
        • org.jgrapes.portal.events.ResourceRequest
          • org.jgrapes.portal.events.PortletResourceRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<ResourceResult>, Associator, Eligible

    public class PortletResourceRequest
extends ResourceRequest

    An event that signals the request of a resource by the portal (browser). Resource request from the browser for a portlet resource are usually generated during portal boot. See the description of AddPortletType for details.
